PCSFP00.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(!ç¢)
   % TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
   } TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(BLUE)
   + TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(GREEN)
   Ñ TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(TURQ)
   { TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
   ? TYPE(INPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(YELLOW) PAD(_)
)BODY WINDOW(50,20)

   %1+ claves del CKDS        }keys in the CKDS

   %2+ claves del PKDS        }keys in the PKDS

   %3+ Refresh del CKDS       }Refresh CKDS

   %4+ Hash de un texto       }hash of a text

   %5+ Firma de un texto      }signature of a text

   %6+ Encriptar un fichero   }Encipher a file

   %7+ Desencriptar un fichero}Decipher a file

   %8+ Numeros aleatorios     }Random numbers

  %OPCION :?P+

)INIT
  &ZWINTTL='< Pergen''s radical company >'
  &P = ' '
)PROC
   &ZSEL=TRANS(TRUNC(&P,'.')
             1,'CMD(%PCSF01) SUSPEND'
             2,'CMD(%PCSF02) SUSPEND'
             3,'CMD(%PCSF03) SUSPEND'
             4,'CMD(%PCSF04) SUSPEND'
             5,'CMD(%PCSF05) SUSPEND'
             6,'CMD(%PCSF06) SUSPEND'
             7,'CMD(%PCSF07) SUSPEND'
             8,'CMD(%PCSF08) SUSPEND'
             ' ','EXIT'
             *,'?')
)END

PCSFP01.text:
)ATTR
$ TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
_ TYPE(INPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(GREEN) PAD(_) CAPS(ON)
? TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(BLUE)
% TYPE(TEXT) COLOR(WHITE)
¢ TYPE(TEXT) COLOR(WHITE)
¬ TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)
" TYPE(TEXT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(BLUE)
)BODY WINDOW(80,17)
"COMMAND+===>_ZCMD                                    "SCROLL+===>_AMT +
¢ delete
¢ (d)      Label                                                     Type
¢------------------------------------------------------------------------------
)MODEL
  _Z?Z                                                               ?Z       +
¢------------------------------------------------------------------------------
)INIT
 &ZWINTTL='< Pergen''s radical company >'
 .ZVARS ='(SEL1 LABEL TYPE)'
 &ZTDMARK='      ---<< fin de claves - end of keys >>---'
 &AMT = 'CSR'
)PROC
 VER (&SEL1,LIST,D,d)
)END

PCSFP03.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(!ç¢)
   % TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
   } TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(BLUE)
   + TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(GREEN)
   Ñ TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(TURQ)
   { TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
   ? TYPE(INPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(YELLOW) PAD(_)
)BODY WINDOW(72,12)

   %fichero con los datos (cuentan los blancos)
   +file with the data (blanks are used) which the hash is generated
   ?file                                        + <pf1> help

   %Seleccione el tipo de algoritmo
   +Select the Hash Method
      %1+ MD5  +
      %2+ SHA-1+       =>?P+
      %3+ RPMD-160+

)INIT
  &ZWINTTL='< Pergen''s radical company >'
  &P = ' '
  .HELP=PCSFPH01
)PROC
 VER (&file,NB,DSNAME)
 VER (&P,NB,LIST,1,2,3)
)END

PCSFP05.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(!ç¢)
   % TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
   } TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(BLUE)
   + TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(GREEN)
   Ñ TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(TURQ)
   { TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
   ? TYPE(INPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(YELLOW) PAD(_)
)BODY

   %fichero con los datos (cuentan los blancos)
   +file with the data (blanks are used) which the hash is generated
   ?file                                        + <pf1> help

   %Seleccione el tipo de algoritmo
   +Select the Hash Method
      %1+ MD5  +
      %2+ SHA-1+       =>?P+
      %3+ RPMD-160+

  Seleccione (s) la clave a usar ( select the key to use )
 --------------------------------------------------------------------------
)MODEL
 ?Z+ÑZ                                                               +
)INIT
  &ZWINTTL='< Pergen''s radical company >'
 .ZVARS ='(SEL LABEL)'
  .HELP=PCSFPH01
  &ZTDMARK='                  ---<< -O- >>---'
)PROC
 VER (&file,NB,DSNAME)
 VER (&P,NB,LIST,1,2,3)
 VER (&SEL,NB,LIST,S,s)
)END

PCSFP07.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(!ç¢)
   % TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
   } TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(BLUE)
   + TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(GREEN)
   { TYPE(OUTPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
)BODY WINDOW(74,18)

   + Hash {tipo      +
   + data {file                                         +

        Hash{Hashd                                   +

  Signature  ISO-9796
    {Sig1                                                            +
    {Sig2                                                            +
    {Sig3                                                            +
    {Sig4                                                            +
    {Sig5                                                            +
    {Sig6                                                            +
    {Sig7                                                            +
    {Sig8                                                            +

)INIT
  &ZWINTTL='< Pergen''s radical company >'
)END

PCSFP10.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(!ç¢)
   % TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
   } TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(BLUE)
   + TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(GREEN)
   Ñ TYPE(OUTPUT) INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(TURQ) JUST(RIGHT)
   { TYPE(TEXT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE)
   ? TYPE(INPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(YELLOW) PAD(_)
)BODY WINDOW(50,18)

     hex                     dec

  Ñalehex1         +   -> Ñaledec1             +
  Ñalehex2         +   -> Ñaledec2             +
  Ñalehex3         +   -> Ñaledec3             +
  Ñalehex4         +   -> Ñaledec4             +
  Ñalehex5         +   -> Ñaledec5             +
  Ñalehex6         +   -> Ñaledec6             +
  Ñalehex7         +   -> Ñaledec7             +
  Ñalehex8         +   -> Ñaledec8             +
  Ñalehex9         +   -> Ñaledec9             +
  Ñalehex10        +   -> Ñaledec10            +
  Ñalehex11        +   -> Ñaledec11            +
  Ñalehex12        +   -> Ñaledec12            +

           }<PF3>%exit+
)INIT
  &ZWINTTL='< Pergen''s radical company >'
)END

RECEIVE.text:
/* this rexx exec is expected to be invoked by the EXEC command
           thus:

           EXec 'dsname(RECEIVE)'

           Prompting will occur for hlq and optional volser.

           and it will then issue the TSO RECEIVE command for the
           the following members to create these new data sets:

           Member       Dataset
           ASM          hlq.ASM
           EXEC         hlq.EXEC
           LOAD         hlq.LOAD
           PANELS       hlq.PANELS
           ZLIB         hlq.ZLIB

           You will then need to copy these datasets/members into
           datasets for production use.

           After these data sets are created several of the members
           of this install data set will be browsed.
           */

        parse source x1 x2 x3 x4 dsn .
         x = PROMPT("ON") /* enable prompting */

        say "Enter desired hlq for target data sets",
            "(default is" sysvar("syspref")".TXT2PDF.NEW):"
        pull hlq
        hlq = strip(hlq)

        if hlq = "" then hlq = sysvar("syspref")".TXT2PDF.NEW"

        say "Enter optional volser for target data sets",
            "default is to allow standard allocation to",
            "find a volume."
        pull volser
        volser = strip(volser)

        if volser <> "" then vol = "vol("volser")"
                        else vol = ""

        Say "Using HLQ:" hlq
        if vol <> "" then
           Say "Using Volser:" volser

        queue "dsn('"hlq".asm')" vol
        "Receive inds('"dsn"(asm)')"
        queue "dsn('"hlq".exec')" vol
        "Receive inds('"dsn"(exec)')"
        queue "dsn('"hlq".panels')" vol
        "Receive inds('"dsn"(panels)')"
        queue "dsn('"hlq".load')" vol
        "Receive inds('"dsn"(load)')"
        queue "dsn('"hlq".zlib')" vol
        "Receive inds('"dsn"(zlib)')"

        if sysvar('sysispf') <> "ACTIVE" then exit
        Address ISPEXEC
           "Browse dataset('"dsn"(changes)')"
           "Browse dataset('"dsn"(install)')"
           "Browse dataset('"dsn"(license)')"
